result.eng: Do they know where we are?
result.ga: An bhfuil a fhios acu cá bhfuil muid
result.orig: An bhfuil a fhios acu cá bhfuil muid
result.html: An bhfuil a fhios acu cá bhfuil muidDo they know where we are?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil a ḟios acu cá ḃfuil muidDo they know where we are?

result.eng: He was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.
result.ga: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan dua
result.orig: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan dua
result.html: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan duaHe was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.
result.ponchtml: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus ẛáraiġ sé gaċ duine eile gan duaHe was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.

result.eng: They were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ga: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.orig: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.html: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an Ġaeilge á húsáid acu mar ṫeanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.

result.eng: Which would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ga: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.orig: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.html: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu ab ḟearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?

result.eng: Which route would you choose for the new train line?
result.ga: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nua
result.orig: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nua
result.html: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nuaWhich route would you choose for the new train line?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu bealaċ a roġnófá le haġaiḋ an líne traenaċ nuaWhich route would you choose for the new train line?

result.eng: Which woman will you marry?
result.ga: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh tú
result.orig: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh tú
result.html: Cé acu bean a phósfaidh túWhich woman will you marry?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu bean a ṗósfaiḋ túWhich woman will you marry?

result.eng: Which of my friends will get an invitation?
result.ga: Cé acu de mo chairde a gheobhaidh cuireadh
result.orig: Cé acu de mo chairde a gheobhaidh cuireadh
result.html: Cé acu de mo chairde a gheobhaidh cuireadhWhich of my friends will get an invitation?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu de mo ċairde a ġeoḃaiḋ cuireaḋWhich of my friends will get an invitation?

result.eng: People who speak Irish, for example you and me.
result.ga: Daoine a bhfuil Gaeilge acu mar shampla tusa agus mise
result.orig: Daoine a bhfuil Gaeilge acu mar shampla tusa agus mise
result.html: Daoine a bhfuil Gaeilge acu mar shampla tusa agus misePeople who speak Irish, for example you and me.
result.ponchtml: Daoine a ḃfuil Gaeilge acu mar ẛampla tusa agus misePeople who speak Irish, for example you and me.

result.eng: The less money they have the better.
result.ga: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.

result.eng: No matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ga: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.orig: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.html: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ponchtml: Dá ṁéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.

result.eng: People can have dreams and achieve them.
result.ga: Is féidir le daoine aisling a bheith acu agus í a bhaint amach
result.orig: Is féidir le daoine aisling a bheith acu agus í a bhaint amach
result.html: Is féidir le daoine aisling a bheith acu agus í a bhaint amachPeople can have dreams and achieve them.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir le daoine aisling a ḃeiṫ acu agus í a ḃaint amaċPeople can have dreams and achieve them.

result.eng: I am one of them.
result.ga: Is mise duine acu
result.orig: Is mise duine acu
result.html: Is mise duine acuI am one of them.
result.ponchtml: Is mise duine acuI am one of them.

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ga: Níl fios a ngnó acu
result.orig: Níl fios a ngnó acu
result.html: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ponchtml: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.eng: They still remember you.
result.ga: Tá cuimhne acu ort fós
result.orig: Tá cuimhne acu ort fós
result.html: Tá cuimhne acu ort fósThey still remember you.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuiṁne acu ort fósThey still remember you.

result.eng: They are planning a new system.
result.ga: Tá córas nua á bheartú acu
result.orig: Tá córas nua á bheartú acu
result.html: Tá córas nua á bheartú acuThey are planning a new system.
result.ponchtml: Tá córas nua á ḃeartú acuThey are planning a new system.

result.eng: They have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ga: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.orig: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.html: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ponchtml: Tá plean acu líne traenaċ nua a ṫógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.

result.eng: They have promised that the work will be finished soon.
result.ga: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luath
result.orig: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luath
result.html: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeidh an obair críochnaithe go luathThey have promised that the work will be finished soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé geallta acu go mbeiḋ an obair críoċnaiṫe go luaṫThey have promised that the work will be finished soon.

result.eng: They are engaged in a new project.
result.ga: Tá tionscnamh nua idir lámha acu
result.orig: Tá tionscnamh nua idir lámha acu
result.html: Tá tionscnamh nua idir lámha acuThey are engaged in a new project.
result.ponchtml: Tá tionscnaṁ nua idir láṁa acuThey are engaged in a new project.

result.eng: The two of them are at school.
result.ga: Tá an bheirt acu ar scoil
result.orig: Tá an bheirt acu ar scoil
result.html: Tá an bheirt acu ar scoilThe two of them are at school.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ḃeirt acu ar scoilThe two of them are at school.

result.eng: They have a nice house.
result.ga: Tá teach deas acu
result.orig: Tá teach deas acu
result.html: Tá teach deas acuThey have a nice house.
result.ponchtml: Tá teaċ deas acuThey have a nice house.

result.eng: They have the best traditional music there.
result.ga: Bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den chéad scoth acu ansin
result.orig: Bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den chéad scoth acu ansin
result.html: Bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den chéad scoth acu ansinThey have the best traditional music there.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn ceol traidisiúnta den ċéad scoṫ acu ansinThey have the best traditional music there.

result.eng: They speak a little Welsh.
result.ga: Tá beagáinín Breatnaise acu
result.orig: Tá beagáinín Breatnaise acu
result.html: Tá beagáinín Breatnaise acuThey speak a little Welsh.
result.ponchtml: Tá beagáinín Breatnaise acuThey speak a little Welsh.

result.eng: What else do they have here to eat?
result.ga: Céard eile atá acu anseo le n-ithe
result.orig: Céard eile atá acu anseo le n-ithe
result.html: Céard eile atá acu anseo le n-itheWhat else do they have here to eat?
result.ponchtml: Céard eile atá acu anseo le n-iṫeWhat else do they have here to eat?

result.eng: Which one?
result.ga: Cé acu ceann
result.orig: Cé acu ceann
result.html: Cé acu ceannWhich one?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu ceannWhich one?

result.eng: The ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ga: Tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le Dia
result.orig: Tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le Dia
result.html: Tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le DiaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ponchtml: Tá an deiċniúr acu fós beo buíoċas le DiaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.

result.eng: Which of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó SiobhánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sine tusa nó SioḃánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?

result.eng: Which one of you is older?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sineWhich one of you is older?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sineWhich one of you is older?

result.eng: Two of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ga: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag
result.orig: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag
result.html: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheagTwo of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá ċeann acu an-ṁór aċ tá an ceann eile an-ḃeagTwo of them are very big but the other one is very small.

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon údar agamsa lena ċeapaḋ naċ raiḃ aiṫne acu ar a ċéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.eng: They had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ga: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.orig: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.html: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíoċta a ċur os coṁair an ṗobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.

result.eng: They are scheming something!
result.ga: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acu
result.orig: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acu
result.html: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acuThey are scheming something!
result.ponchtml: Tá uisce faoi ṫalaṁ éigin ar siúl acuThey are scheming something!

result.eng: They had strong Slavic accents.
result.ga: Bhí canúintí láidre Slavacha acu
result.orig: Bhí canúintí láidre Slavacha acu
result.html: Bhí canúintí láidre Slavacha acuThey had strong Slavic accents.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí canúintí láidre Slavaċa acuThey had strong Slavic accents.

result.eng: They had a two-year old child.
result.ga: Bhí páiste dhá bhliain d'aois acu
result.orig: Bhí páiste dhá bhliain d'aois acu
result.html: Bhí páiste dhá bhliain d'aois acuThey had a two-year old child.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí páiste ḋá ḃliain d'aois acuThey had a two-year old child.

result.eng: He recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ga: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.orig: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.html: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ponchtml: D'earcaiġ sé 15 duine eile naċ raiḃ mórán taiṫí acu aċ i ḃforéigean agus ċuadar faoi oiliúintHe recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.

result.eng: To wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ga: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.orig: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.html: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ponchtml: Cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mór go háiriṫe ar ṫíorṫa a raiḃ ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.

result.eng: But many of them look tired now.
result.ga: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo
result.orig: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo
result.html: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seoBut many of them look tired now.
result.ponchtml: Aċ tá cuma spíonta ar ċuid ṁór acu fán tráṫ seoBut many of them look tired now.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.html: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar á ċur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.html: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ponchtml: Ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.

result.eng: I was their only child.
result.ga: Ní raibh acu ach mé
result.orig: Ní raibh acu ach mé
result.html: Ní raibh acu ach méI was their only child.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ acu aċ méI was their only child.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug 'aċ aon duine acu láṁ is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: D'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: D'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.

result.eng: They have their guns pointed at the door.
result.ga: Tá na gunnaí aimsithe ar an doras acu
result.orig: Tá na gunnaí aimsithe ar an doras acu
result.html: Tá na gunnaí aimsithe ar an doras acuThey have their guns pointed at the door.
result.ponchtml: Tá na gunnaí aimsiṫe ar an doras acuThey have their guns pointed at the door.
